>
[Wand of Shattering Images](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2290)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 142 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Shattered pieces of a glass mirror, formed into a reflective mosaic, comprise the irregular shaft of this wand. The handle is black and polished smooth, the pommel capped with a tiny reflective orb.

<document level="2" id="action-1838" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _mirror image_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
